issue.title: [Packaging][Python] Windows py35 wheel build fails because of boost
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8465](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8465). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See build log https://github.com/ursa-labs/crossbow/branches/all?query=nightly-2020-04-14-3-appveyor-wheel-win-cp35m

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8465?focusedCommentId=17083721) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6941
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6941>

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8465?focusedCommentId=17083738) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
The cause of the failure in https://github.com/ursa-labs/crossbow/branches/all?query=nightly-2020-04-14-3-appveyor-wheel-win-cp35m is odd. Should it be investigated?
